name: Bite Size Terrors: Erobos Heaven
description:
Bite Size Terrors:

Are Short Experimental Horror Experiences each with their own Unique Genres and Styles.
From the Creator of Notebook Entries, this is...

Erobos Heaven:

  • A Very Uncanny Experience, with unsettling voices and sounds.
  • Focusing on Darkness, the game removes your sight, to enhance Sound Design & Tension. Never know what's around you.
  • Uneasy Happenings rise to a very Disturbing sighting in a short amount of time.
  • Replayability is a must. Different scares/events happen with certain interactions. Did you leave the Front Door Open? Closet Door Open? Walk towards the noise? Did you look fast enough?
  • No handholding.
  • Gameplay is about 20-30 mins.

Story:

As the world starts to be tossed in disarray with different creatures, disturbing sightings & cosmic events flooding our very existence.
You start to pray to a god, with sheer panic you don't think of who.
Answering to your Prayers, you get teleported into Salvation's land.
But..
What or Who answered your Prayer?

Gameplay:

Simple, You walk around an isolated location, living through each day with more & more unease. The Darkness obscures your screen, making you carefully walk slowly around the house, looking at the floor or for any lighting available. Your Walk Speed is influenced by your character's reactions or feelings, showing urgency or calmness when the time is right.
